mapper.select: select id, task_type, url, status, create_time, update_time from lihao.jd_help_url where id = #{id}
select id, task_type, url, status, create_time, update_time from lihao.jd_help_url limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lihao.jd_help_url(task_type, url, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{taskType}, #{url}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into lihao.jd_help_url(task_type, url, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskType}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into lihao.jd_help_url(task_type, url, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskType}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update task_type = values(task_type) , url = values(url) , status = values(status) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update lihao.jd_help_url
task_type = #{taskType},
url = #{url},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
